channel.title: Server not connecting
channel.description:
Ok, so I don't know much at all about this whole moparscape/compiler/client thing. Now, I got to the moparscape website, and when I try to run the game from there it says "Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click "Start server" to make your own." So, I tried just that, and got the same thing. I then go to the server status page, and tried numerous different servers. Still, I get the same result. So now, I try downloading the moparscape client. It opens up fine, and when I try to log in, I get an error saying: "Account is already logged in. Try again, or make a different account name." So, again I follow the instructions, with no result. Confused, I run to the forums, looking at guides. I follow everything on them (Downloading the latest java, reinstalling moparscape) And still these same results keep on coming up. Help would be appreciated :)
I have also tried searching the site for topics that have had the same problems, but they were all solved by the things that mine weren't.

item.title: Server not connecting
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Are you trying to connect to your own server, or someone else’s?

Read full topic

item.title: Server not connecting
item.dc:creator: @socks_ftw socks ftw
item.description:
@socks_ftw wrote:

You may class this as “Thread necromancy”, but it’s still happening.

I tried all of this, and it’s still not working. I just get “Error connecting to server”. I have allowed the port through the firewall, I’ve done all of the portforwarding and yet it still tells me there’s an error whilst trying to connect to the server.

Read full topic

item.description:
